com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.security
Class BaseAuthorizationManager

java.lang.Object
  com.google.enterprise.connector.salesforce.security.BaseAuthorizationManager

public class BaseAuthorizationManager
extends java.lang.Object

Class implementing the Authorization Iterface of the connector This class is called by the connector when it needs to authenticate a user
